Summary: triangular, light in each corner and a single light in centre-there was no flashing lights.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Wolverhampton
There were no other sightings in Wolverhampton on or around July 20th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the flat and I had an urge to go outside with the video camcorder-this happens when I 'feel' there is something flying over-I cannot explain this but it is the first time I have been able to capture one of several events on digital 8. I had the urge to go into a carpark a few hundred yards down the road. when I entered the carpark I heard a rumbling low hum and looked up. My first thoughts when I noticed the UFO was, "at last I can prove these things are really happening to me"! I thought that the object was 'WOW' factor. I tried to think of what object could be but it did not resemble anything i had seen before. The object was flying above and over my head in a straight line. I thought it released an orb and so followed the orb-however this was a star that it flew past. I was excited and releaved that I had finally caught on film One of the phenomena that has been with me through-out my life. **There was a second object following the first. It was a silver intense light. The Camcorder was set on nightshot and as I raised the cam to film the light, it wentout and was lost in the star field. I am more pleased due to events I have witnessed, were too frightening for another witness to talk about. She was with me when four silver 'star' like objects came out of the blue sky and hovered above 2 jets a couple of years ago! for more info feel free to contact me. the clip is 146mb and it is copyright. contact me and I will release a picture.
